text: Bhopal Uttar Vidhan Sabha Constituency is one of the 230 assembly constituencies of Madhya Pradesh. It comes under Bhopal district. ==Members of Legislative Assembly== {| class="wikitable" width=80% |- ! style="background- color:#666666; color:white" colspan="2"|Year ! style="background- color:#666666; color:white"|Member ! style="background-color:#666666; color:white"|Political Party |- |style="background-color: " | || 1977 || Hamid Qureshi || Janata Party |- |style="background-color: " | || 1980 || Rasool Ahmad Siddiqui || Indian National Congress (I) |- |style="background-color: " | || 1985 || Rasool Ahmad Siddiqui || Indian National Congress |- |style="background-color: " | || 1990 || Arif Aqueel || Independent |- |style="background-color: " | || 1993 || Ramesh Sharma || Bharatiya Janata Party |- |style="background-color: " | || 1998 || Arif Aqueel || Indian National Congress |- |style="background-color: " | || 2003 || Arif Aqueel || Indian National Congress |- |style="background-color: " | || 2008 || Arif Aqueel || Indian National Congress |- |style="background-color: " | || 2013 || Arif Aqueel || Indian National Congress |- |style="background-color: " | || 2018 || Arif Aqueel || Indian National Congress |- |} ==Election Results== ===2018 results === ==References== *http://www.mapsofindia.com/parliamentaryconstituencies/madhyapradesh/bhopal.htm&sa;=U&ved;=0ahUKEwjYnKG6lqzTAhUBOI8KHVYMBY8QFggOMBE&usg;=AFQjCNE_9FMWV6exzEuWMtWJmambOV2ssA *http://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/bhopal/Arif-Aqueel-pitches-in-for- minority-face-as-leader-of-oppositio/articleshow/55279775.cms Category:Assembly constituencies of Madhya Pradesh Category:Bhopal district
